info.title: Simple API for DDF
info.description: A simple TransCelerate Digital Data Flow (DDF) Study Definitions Repository API.

post.description: Create an entire study including all child element with a single post

schema.title: Response Create Study V3 Studydefinitions Post

put.description: Update an entire study including all child element with a single put

schema.title: Response Update Study V3 Studydefinitions  Studyid  Put

get.description: Return an entire study including all child elements
Returns the history for the specified study

schema.title: Response Read Study History V3 Studydefinitions  Studyid  History Get

get.description: Returns all the study designs for a specified study.

schema.title: Response Search Study Design V3 Studydesigns Get
